item.title: #en @ 1446205063408521222
item.description:
Strongly endorse the call from @MaxCRoser and @_HannahRitchie for @IEA to make their high-resolution energy data publicly accessible.
In a world where data is power, it is unjust to keep critical energy data hidden behind steep paywalls. https://t.co/4iQqh0E1uk

item.title: #en @ 1445872688547840000
item.description: "Addressing problems of colonialism will ultimately not entail whether open data practices are implicitly and universally decolonial, but whether Indigenous peoples have shared governance over the afterlives of data generated about and affecting them."

item.title: #en @ 1445872539159252994
item.description: "At stake here is ensuring that Indigenous peoples have control over and benefit from information generated from their communities, otherwise open data practices act as just another form of colonial dispossession."
